scenes.background: Bob is leaning back in his chair, looking frustrated. Monica nervously taps her pen on the table.
scenes.description: 'I just don't see how this could have gone wrong, Monica. Can you explain?'

options.text: Let's think about what we can learn from this and move forward.
options.analysis: You suggested a reflective approach, showing good perception and self-regulation, but the emotional impact on others was not deeply addressed.

options.text: Monica, it would help if you could specify what went wrong and how we can improve.
options.analysis: You directed the conversation towards Monica and asked for specifics, demonstrating empathy and social skills, but the perception of the broader problem could be stronger.

options.text: Bob, perhaps we should discuss this later and come up with a better plan.
options.analysis: You suggested postponing the discussion to avoid immediate conflict, showing good social skill but lower empathy and motivation to resolve the issue now.
